publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Job 23
ab.l: Da qaruv b́erdi Ijov da ajtty.
Daɣy b́uǵuń ačydyr zavalym syz- lavym avur boldu kistunmaɣym üśt́uńa.
Kim b́erip bilip ornun da tapsa edim any kelśa edim qyjasyna d́ejiń.
T́uźuǵa edim alnynda t́oŕa da avzumnu tolturɣa edim üǵut́ĺard́ań.
Biĺ- ǵa edim ńe śoźĺar qaruv b́erir maja da anlaɣa edim ńe ajtyr maja.
Ḱop quvat byla da karat́et́śa ḿeni t́ek öźu qojmasmudur kiplik maja.
Anda t́uź bolup t́oŕaĺaš́śa edim birǵasińa da qutulɣa edim öḿurǵa d́ejiń t́oŕačimd́ań.
Muna mizraḥqa barsam da biĺmimiń da maʿarav- da da anlajalmejmyn any.
Cafonnu jaratḥanynda da ḱorḿadim qaplady daromnu da anlamadym.
Ki biĺadir ńe joldur qatymda synasa ḿeni altyn kibik aruv čyɣarmyn.
Jyzyn anyn tuttu ajaɣym jolun saqladym da qajyrylmadym.
Saruvun bujruḥlaryjnyn eksit́ḿadim artyḥ resimińd́ań saqladym ajt- maḥlaryn bujruɣunun.
Da ol bir śoź byla ajtsa da kim qaruv qajtaralyr anar da kĺagi kĺaśa da qyladyr.
Ki t́uǵaĺ et́ti resimimni da bular kibik ḱopĺar qatynda.
Anyn üč́uń alnyndan alɣasanamyn fikirimni qujamyn da qorḥamyn andan.
Vale T́eńri jymšatty juŕagimni da ḱuč́ĺu T́eńri alɣasatty ḿeni.
Ki eksiĺḿadim alnyndan qaranɣynyn da alnymdan qaplady tumanny.
